scripts.postcss: postcss base/index.css -o dist/base.css && postcss styled/index.css -o dist/styled.css && postcss styled/full.css -o dist/full.css && postcss themes/index.css -o dist/themes.css
scripts.json: prejss-cli dist/base.css --format commonjs && prejss-cli dist/styled.css --format commonjs && prejss-cli dist/themes.css --format commonjs
scripts.build: npm run postcss && npm run json
scripts.add: touch base/components/$npm_config_name.css && touch styled/components/$npm_config_name.css && echo '@import "./components/'$npm_config_name'";' >> base/index.css && echo '@import "./components/'$npm_config_name'";' >> styled/index.css && open base/components/$npm_config_name.css && open styled/components/$npm_config_name.css
